rules_text:
Vigilance, trample
[i]Grim[/i] – When Zephiel, King of Bern enters, destroy target tapped creature.
[i]Unleashing the Dragon[/i] – Whenever one or more creatures attack one of your opponents, create a 3/3 red Dragon Knight creature token with flying.
[i]Liberator[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, each player sacrifices a creature.
